```{r settings}
#
# T. cruzi infecting H. sapiens (all samples)
#
# Updated 2017/11/20:
# - CPM=TRUE
# - Cutoff: ?
#

#
# Manuscript-specific configuration
#
MANUSCRIPT_CONFIG <- list(
    title           = "Consensus Co-expression Network Comparison: T. cruzi infecting H. sapiens", 
    input_dir       = file.path(Sys.getenv('SCRATCH'), 'param_opt', 'normal',
                                'tcruzi_all_samples-multicopy-v6.0'),
    output_dirname  = 'tcruzi',
    quantile_cutoff = 0.25
)

#
# Only include networks constructed from CPM-transformed counts (performs much
# better for T. cruzi
#
nets <- read_csv(file.path(Sys.getenv('r15'), '115-coex-network-param-opt-v6',
                           'output', 'normal',
                           'tcruzi_all_samples-multicopy-v6.0.csv')) %>%
    filter(cpm_transform == TRUE)

nets_to_include <- sprintf('%d_adjmat.RData', nets$id)
rdas_to_include <- sprintf('%d.RData', nets$id)

#
# Base co-expression analysis configuration
#
CONFIG <- list(
    host            = "H. sapiens",
    pathogen        = "T. cruzi",
    target          = "pathogen",

    organism_db     = "Trypanosoma.cruzi.CLBrener.Esmeraldo",
    organism_genome = "TcCLB",
    orgdb_key       = "GID",

    input_count_tables  = file.path(Sys.getenv("SCRATCH"), "tcruzi-hsapiens",
                                   "counts", "tcruzi", "*.count"),

    samples             = read_csv(file.path(Sys.getenv('RESEARCH'), '2015',
                                             '03-coex-network-tcruzi-infecting-hsapiens',
                                             'settings', 'tcruzi_samples.csv')),
    sample_id         = 'HPGL_ID',
    condition         = 'Condition',
    batch             = 'Batch',
    covariates        = c('Batch'),
    filter_multicopy  = FALSE,

    main_comparison     = c(4, 72),
    main_comparison_label = "72 - 4 hours",

    verbose             = FALSE,
    include_tables      = TRUE,
    include_plots       = FALSE,
    debug               = FALSE,
    use_cache           = FALSE
)
```
